Uses of Package
tripleplay.anim

Packages that use tripleplay.anim
tripleplay.anim   
tripleplay.game   
 

Classes in tripleplay.anim used by tripleplay.anim
Animation
          Represents a single component of an animation.
Animation.Action
          An animation that executes an action and completes immediately.
Animation.Delay
          An animation that simply delays a specified number of seconds.
Animation.Flip
           
Animation.Interped
          A base class for animations that interpolate values.
Animation.One
          An animation that animates a single scalar value.
Animation.Two
          An animation that animates a pair of scalar values (usually a position).
Animation.Value
          Used by animations to update a target value.
Animator
          Handles creation and management of animations.
Flipbook
          Encapsulates a set of frames and timings for animating those frames.
 

Classes in tripleplay.anim used by tripleplay.game
Animator
          Handles creation and management of animations.
